channel.title: MongoDB C++ Driver Manual
channel.description: Recent content on MongoDB C++ Driver Manual

item.title: MongoDB C++ Driver Manual
item.description: MongoDB C++ Driver Welcome to the MongoDB C++ driver. On this site, you'll find documentation to help you get the most from MongoDB and C++. If you're just starting out, take a look at these pages first: [Installing mongocxx]({{ ref “mongocxx-v3/installation.md” }}) [Quick-start tutorial]({{ ref “mongocxx-v3/tutorial.md” }}) Driver status by family and version Stability indicates whether this driver is recommended for production use. Currently, no drivers guarantee API or ABI stability.
